description:
Includes 11 Himouto! Umaru-chan wallpapers with a falling rose petal effect.
To display different wallpapers, modify the src attribute on line 28 of index.html. Change it to a file from xm1.jpg to xm11.png (Note: 4 and 11 are .png files).
title: Umaru (Falling Rose Petals + 11 Wallpapers)
